title: Samurai Jack - The Premiere Move (DVD9)
description:
Samurai Jack - The Premiere Movie

(aka the first 3 episodes of the series)


Edit:  This DVD and the rest in the series are on this torrent:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4416365


Fantastic show.  If you've never heard of it, I highly reccomend this download.

This is my first torrent.  I'm in the process of collecting all the other Samurai Jack DVDs, so keep an eye out for more.

Also, I don't plan on seeding this until the end of time, so don't waste bandwidth downloading it unless you're seriously planning on seeding until you've "paid back" what you've "taken".

For those of you who don't understand how a torrent works, here's the short version:

If you don't seed until you've uploaded 100% of what you've donwloaded then one of two things happens:  either A. someone else uploads 200% making up for what you didn't upload or B. the torrent dies, and you're the last person to get it.

Don't be a dick.
